publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1408 Alex Fergusson: Kirkcudbright Academy Junior Debating Champions-That the Parliament congratulates the Kirkcudbright Academy debating team and its coach on winning the National Junior Debating Competition, sponsored by the English Speaking Union, particularly as this was the first time the academy had entered this prestigious competition which receives entries from all over Scotland, and notes that the team was commended for showing "maturity beyond its tender years" and a level of debating skills that completely belied the school's previous experience in debating. Supported by: Phil Gallie*, Mr Brian Monteith*, David Mundell*

S2M-1408 Alex Fergusson: Kirkcudbright Academy Junior Debating Champions-That the Parliament congratulates the Kirkcudbright Academy debating team and its coach on winning the National Junior Debating Competition, sponsored by the English Speaking Union, particularly as this was the first time the academy had entered this prestigious competition which receives entries from all over Scotland, and notes that the team was commended for showing "maturity beyond its tender years" and a level of debating skills that completely belied the school's previous experience in debating. Supported by: Phil Gallie, Mr Brian Monteith, David Mundell, Christine Grahame*
S2M-1408 Kirkcudbright Academy Junior Debating Champions (lodged on 3 June 2004) Mr Stewart Maxwell*
S2M-1408 Kirkcudbright Academy Junior Debating Champions (lodged on 3 June 2004) John Swinburne*
